response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds immense value for you. This product is not just any item; it has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique attributes and the benefits it offers, I am confident that it would significantly enhance your life or business.

Considering its worth to you, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value you see in the product and the price I am willing to accept, aiming to ensure a fair transaction for both parties.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and financial considerations. I am more than happy to discuss further details or explore alternative arrangements if needed. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
